summary: This mod adds 6 Centaurs in Skyrim (6 Summonable Mounts + Army of Centaurs)
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds 6 Centaurs in Skyrim (6 Summonable Mounts + Army of Centaurs). [i][b]The DLC Dragonborn is required[/b][/i].

[img]https://i.imgur.com/EiwJBM6.gif[/img]

[b][color=#ff0000]SUMMONABLE MOUNTS[/color][/b]

To have the SUMMONABLE Mounts, you must buy the 6 “Spell tome: summon XX”, at [color=#00ff00][b]Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach[/b][/color]/Fort Dragon (Whiterun) or with an other "Spell Vendor" (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace/Palais bleu in Solitude).

With the books, you have the spells (Duration of the summon: 1 hour) ...

You can easily DISMISS when you want ! with an other "Spell tome: Dismiss Centaurs"

In order to buy the 7 books at Farengar, [b][i]you must place this mod at the bottom of the list when you launch the game[/i][/b]

[url=https://www.casimages.com/img.php?i=18072905160716616015826326.jpg][img]https://nsm09.casimages.com/img/2018/07/29//18072905160716616015826326.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000][b]ARMY OF CENTAURS[/b][/color] ([b][i]version 2.5 only[/i][/b])

This mod adds the ability to quickly create hordes of Centaurs (5, 15, 50, 100 ...MORE ?...ATTENTION with the freezes in your computer !)

To obtain these Centaurs, simply buy scrolls found with some Merchants in Whiterun: [color=#00ff00][i][b]Arcadia of Arcadia’s Cauldron, Anoriath, Hulda of the Bannered Mare [/b][/i][/color] Now open up your inventory, navigate to "Scrolls" and there they are. You throw them and when they hit the ground they hatch into Centaurs.

In order to find the scrolls at Merchants, you must choose the mod for which you want to buy and place it at the bottom of the list when you launch the game.


[color=#ff0000][b]COMPANIONS[/b][/color] ([b][i]version 2.3 only[/i][/b])

You can find the 6 Companions/Followers (with voices) in the 5 Stables (Whiterun, Markath, Riften, Solitude, Windhelm) + near Riverwood


[b][color=#ff0000]BUGS or PROBLEMS[/color][/b]

The Centaur can’t jump (it is the skeleton of the « BoarRiekling » from the DLC2, not the skeleton of a horse; no animations to jump in the game !)

You can only have one follower at a time: if you want a different one, you need to dismiss the first one before you recruit them.

If you have any problem with the dialog box, or if telling the follower to return at home doesn't dismiss him, or if you have lost the active follower, you can try this:

Type “²” or "`" or "~" key to get into console, and type:

set playeranimalcount to 0

With Amazing Follower Tweaks , or other mod with followers, if problem to dismiss the followers, you can uncheck this mod (AFT or other) when you launch the game

If problem with the Dialog Box of the followers/ companions (Wait - Follow - Trade - Favor - Dismiss) you can also enter / exit a house or make a fast travel


[b][color=#ff0000]CREDITS[/color][/b]

[color=#ff0000]Mihail Romanov[/color] in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85364/?] Centaurs- Mihail Monsters and Animals (mihail immersive add-ons - daggerfall) [/url] ("Feel free to use my mod in your projects,no need to ask me for permission first")
author: gg77
